About Us

{/* WHY REALLIST SECTION */}

Why RealList?

RealList is a modern real-estate platform designed to help buyers, sellers, and renters connect effortlessly. We provide verified listings, trusted agents, and a seamless property posting experience.

{/* HOW IT WORKS */}

How It Works?

{/* Step 1 - Registration */}

Registration

Create your account in minutes and join RealList.

{/* Step 2 - Create Profile */}

Create Account

Complete your profile to get personalized recommendations.

{/* Step 3 - Add Post */}

Add Property Post

Upload images & details of your property easily.

{/* Step 4 - Earn Money */}

Get Earnings

Sell or rent your property and start earning.

{/* Extra spacing */}
); }; export default About;
